thread.title: Scottish whisky distillers see glass half full on Brexit

title: Scottish whisky distillers see glass half full on Brexit
text:
Scottish whisky distillers see glass half full on Brexit 12:04pm EST - 01:51 
Scotch whisky makers were among the most fervent industry advocates for staying in the European Union, but if Britain cannot get the new trade deal it wants with the EU, distillers would prefer a clean break. Kate King reports.
